title: La Bicicleta
typeOfFood: Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A cool hip bar close to the Mezquita and the river. A lot of locals as well as tourists hang out here. Has vegan choices, but may not be clearly marked on menu, so please inquire. Uses fresh vegetables and fruits. Offers a variety of juices, some of which are vegan.
